favourite.article: 오 !! 사랑의 하나님 당신의 사랑하는 아들을 보내주셔서 감사합니다.
God is Love.. Just believe in Him. Be not perishing, but have eternal life. Just love Him. This is my favorite hymn. ...אדון ישוע אני אוהבת אותך - Lord Jesus, I love You...
We love Him because He first loved us. Amen.

Hallelujah, God is love, this is the highest truth in the universe. Kiss us, dear Father, with the kisses of Your mouth and draw us to You! Keep us everytime into You through Your dear son Jesus Christ and grow into us the full growth of God! Amen.
Oh my Lord Jesus, I believed in You and much more You are my everything. I praise You Lord for I will not perish but I will have eternal life! Amen.
I'm deeply touched by this hymn. Thank You Lord, for Uour love and redemption. Thank You Father, for I'm Your child and You never abandon me!
It's nice. It has a nice flow to it.
God's love is beyond words. God's love deserve our thanks and praises for eternity! God's love is just all I need to keep me running in this spiritual journey.
Thanks for Your Love to me. You are so precious. You are my treasure. Because only with Your Love I could live. I love You, God.
I love this hymn because I love the Lord. He gave His only begotten Son to us. He is our precious Savior.
Our God so loved the world that He gave us His Son. Oh how we need to believe into Him that we would not perish, but would have eternal life. Oh Lord Jesus we love You...
God is love! Praise the Lord! Amen!
God is love and the only thing that we have to do is believe in Him. Let's believe more Him, during every day of our lives!
nothing sweeter than the gospel of the Lord's love...we were yet sinners but Christ died for us, becoming a curse on our behalf. OH WHAT A LOVE ...it reaches even us!
God is love.He reached us.Just believe in Him.
